  • Method Details

    • validateWithResult

      MimeTypeService.ValidationResult validateWithResult(InputStream stream, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided byte array and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Returns a MimeTypeService.ValidationResult containing both the declared and detected MIME types. This result can be used to drive custom logic based on whether the detected type matches the declared type.
      Parameters:
      stream - input stream of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Returns:
      MimeTypeService.ValidationResult containing the declared and detected MIME types.

    • validateWithResult

      default MimeTypeService.ValidationResult validateWithResult(byte[] data, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided byte array and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Returns a MimeTypeService.ValidationResult containing both the declared and detected MIME types. This result can be used to drive custom logic based on whether the detected type matches the declared type.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Returns:
      MimeTypeService.ValidationResult containing the declared and detected MIME types.

    • validateWithBoolean

      default boolean validateWithBoolean(InputStream stream, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided byte array and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Returns true if the full MIME type matches, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      stream - input stream of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Returns:
      true if the full MIME type matches, false otherwise

    • validateWithBoolean

      default boolean validateWithBoolean(byte[] data, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided byte array and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Returns true if the full MIME type matches, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Returns:
      true if the full MIME type matches, false otherwise

    • validateWithException

      default void validateWithException(InputStream stream, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided input stream and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Logs a warning if the full MIME types do not match, throws a RuntimeException if the base MIME types do not match.
      Parameters:
      stream - input stream of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the detected and the declared base MIME type do not match

    • validateWithException

      default void validateWithException(byte[] data, String declared)
      Detects the MIME type of the provided byte array and validates if the detected MIME type equals the declared MIME type. Logs a warning if the full MIME types do not match, throws a RuntimeException if the base MIME types do not match.
      Parameters:
      data - byte array of which the MIME type should be detected
      declared - the declared MIME type of the data, e.g. "application/pdf"
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the detected and the declared base MIME type do not match
